mapper.select: select up.id, title, up.userEmail, userNickname, commissionStatus, profileHit, personalWork from portfolio_upload up left join (select userEmail, userNickname, commissionStatus from profile_user_info) us on us.userEmail = up.userEmail
mapper.update: update portfolio_upload set profileHit = ifnull(profileHit, 0) +1 where id = #{id}
